keywords: I am Tirthankar Chakraborty (commonly known as TC)
language: a staff scientist in the Earth System Modeling Group under the Atmospheric Sciences and Global Change Division of the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory. I am currently working on developing and improving urban representation in land models using various observational products
